title.rendered: The Latest in Biotech Jobs: January 2017

content.rendered:
Are you interested in a new biotech career for the new year? ClinLab Staffing agency works with life science, pharmaceutical, and biotech organizations to manage their staffing needs and bring exciting new job opportunities to you. See what jobs have been available in January 2017.

CLINICAL CATEGORY

Associate Director/Director Regulatory Affairs CMC
Watertown, MA
Responsible for the preparation and implementation of regulatory strategies to facilitate the development and approval of new drugs. Prepares U.S. and international submissions and provides support for regulatory approvals. Responsibilities include communication and coordination with project team members from all disciplines. Support communication and management of regulatory consultants, CROs, and other vendors, as necessary.  read more…

Senior Clinical Research Associate (Oncology)
Northeast, Home-Based
The role of the Senior Clinical Research Associate is to support project team members in activities associated with the set up and running of a clinical trial.. read more… 

PRE-CLINICAL/LIFE SCIENCES CATEGORY

QA Associate
Waltham, MA
Our client is seeking a highly-motivated individual to join the Quality group in support of product development for their multi‐program pipeline. This entry level position will be responsible for the maintenance of our client’s laboratory operations. Job responsibilities are outlined below: read more… 

Medical Laboratory Technologist
Dedham, MA

  • Use a variety of scientific techniques in the laboratory, adhering to Good Laboratory Practices and following SOP’s
  • Prepare components for manufacturing for laboratory processing
  • Perform aliquoting of clinical samples

read more… 

Manager II BioA (Immunochemistry Group Leader)
Raleigh, NC
Facilitate smooth and reliable operation of their teams through prioritizing, monitoring and controlling critical functions. Responsible for coordinating staffing needs, scheduling of instrumentation, budgeting, personnel development and systems improvement. Oversees technical, administrative and fiscal parameters of their group. read more… 

Submit your application to ClinLab Staffing today for the opportunity to be placed in biotech job that is best for you. Resumes can be submitted to: info@clinlabstaffing.com.
